slide.title: Using Timezones
slide.subtitle: The Timezone Object
slide.blurb: Getting the current offset to GMT with a timezone for a specific date:
slide.example:
<?php
	$tz = timezone_open("Europe/Amsterdam");
	$d  = date_create("2005-01-22 09:15");
	echo timezone_offset_get($tz, $d), ', ';
	$d->modify("+6 months");
	echo $tz->getOffset($d);
?>
